name: surviVaR
description:
surviVaR, Free PC VR horror game, made in Unreal engine 4.
You can play this VR horror game completely for free. 

The only thing I ask is to give a bit of feedback in return.
Just what parts you like, what you would make better etc..

Discord:
https://discord.gg/jn2MsBV

Also if you would like to see behind the scenes I have made plenty of devlogs through the development:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQAo6pRlrb_V8JDbmHbljY0xlLi--DdrD
